SELECT MS_VIQ_CODE.VIQ_CODE_ID, MS_VIQ_CODE.VIQ_CODE_NAME_ID, MS_VIQ_CODE.VIQ_VERSION_ID, MS_VIQ_CODE.VIQ_CODE, MS_VIQ_CODE.DESCRIPTION, MS_VIQ_CODE.DESCRIPTION_ENG, MS_VIQ_CODE.ORDER_NO,
MS_VIQ_CODE.DELETE_FLAG, MS_VIQ_CODE.CREATE_DATE, MS_VIQ_CODE.UPDATE_DATE, MS_VIQ_CODE.CREATE_MS_USER_ID, MS_VIQ_CODE.UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
FROM MS_VIQ_CODE
INNER JOIN MS_VIQ_CODE_NAME ON MS_VIQ_CODE_NAME.VIQ_CODE_NAME_ID = MS_VIQ_CODE.VIQ_CODE_NAME_ID
WHERE MS_VIQ_CODE.DELETE_FLAG = False

INSERT INTO MS_VIQ_CODE( VIQ_CODE_NAME_ID, VIQ_VERSION_ID, VIQ_CODE, DESCRIPTION, DESCRIPTION_ENG, ORDER_NO, DELETE_FLAG, UPDATE_MS_USER_ID, CREATE_MS_USER_ID ) VALUES( :VIQ_CODE_NAME_ID, :VIQ_VERSION_ID, :VIQ_CODE, :DESCRIPTION, :DESCRIPTION_ENG, :ORDER_NO, :DELETE_FLAG, :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID, :CREATE_MS_USER_ID )

UPDATE MS_VIQ_CODE SET VIQ_CODE_NAME_ID = :VIQ_CODE_NAME_ID, VIQ_VERSION_ID = :VIQ_VERSION_ID, VIQ_CODE = :VIQ_CODE, DESCRIPTION = :DESCRIPTION, DESCRIPTION_ENG = :DESCRIPTION_ENG, ORDER_NO = :ORDER_NO, DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG, UPDATE_MS_USER_ID = :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
WHERE VIQ_CODE_ID = :VIQ_CODE_ID
